name: Bored Ape Yacht Club
intro: A collection of 10000 unique Bored Ape NFTs
introduce: Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC) is an non-fungible token (NFT) collection built on the Ethereum blockchain. The collection features profile pictures of cartoon apes that are procedurally generated by an algorithm. Owners of a Bored Ape NFT are granted access to a private online club, exclusive in-person events, and intellectual property rights for the image.
